title: Elizabethan England
creator_credit: Clement W. Bending, Gateway Film Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Based on a horseback journey through towns, villages and open country, this film provides a central theme around which sequences are woven illustrating costumes, furniture, architecture, farming and other features of life during the first Elizabethan period. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
